docs.lead_paragraph: Shares in Shire Plc fell 2 percent on Monday after the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) decided not to approve its most important pipeline medicine for dry eye disease and asked for more information.

headline.main: Eye Drug Setback Hits Shire Shares Amid Baxalta Pursuit
headline.print_headline: Eye Drug Setback Hits Shire Shares Amid Baxalta Pursuit

docs.snippet: Shares in Shire Plc fell 2 percent on Monday after the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) decided not to approve its most important pipeline medicine for dry eye disease and asked for more information.

docs.lead_paragraph: Doctors have found that Ebola can linger in some male survivors for up to nine months but aren't sure if that means they might still be infectious, according to new research.

headline.main: Study: Ebola in Male Survivors Can Survive Up to 9 Months
headline.print_headline: Study: Ebola in Male Survivors Can Survive Up to 9 Months

docs.snippet: Doctors have found that Ebola can linger in some male survivors for up to nine months but aren't sure if that means they might still be infectious, according to new research.
